message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to us, we're proposing a price of $12000 for it. This price reflects not only its market value but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. We're confident it will be a worthwhile investment for your company.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only offer $8500 at this time.  This is my top price, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. In light of this, I am pleased to offer you the product at $9000. This price reflects a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer, aiming to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction.
